page.title: 13A Hereford Corner Shop.
page.content: Interview with local shopkeeper conducted by two 6 year olds.(Extract) { Q:-What are the most popular foods? A:-In this area many people live alone and cook for themselves so we sell many oven-ready meals,also milk, bread,crisps and sweets. { Q:-Do you sell local fruit and veg.? A:-Yes, I should think half the fruit and vegetables we sell comes from private people around here. From a local firm I buy more exotic fruits. { Q:-Is there a need for a local shop? A:- Two years ago this shop was closed. We reopened it and if there was no need, we wouldn't be doing as well as we are. { Q:-Might you sell anything else? A:-I've been thinking of selling flowers as the hospital is nearby and the visitors could buy them. { }
